import React,{useRef} from 'react' import './SearchBar.css' import{Col,Form,FormGroup} from "reactstrap"; import{BASE_URL} from './../utils/config'; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' const SearchBar = () => { const showroomsRef = useRef('') const categoryRef = useRef('') const typeRef = useRef('') const navigate = useNavigate() const searchHandler = async()=>{ const showroom = showroomsRef.current.value const category = categoryRef.current.value const type = typeRef.current.value const res = await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/livingrooms/search/getLivingroomBySearch?showroom=${showroom}&&category=${category}&&type=${type}` ) if(!res.ok) alert('Something went wrong') const result = await res.json() navigate(`/livingrooms/search?showroom=${showroom}&category=${category}&type=${type}`,{state:result.data}) } return
Showrooms
Category
Type
} export default SearchBar
